level.heading: REQUIRED SOURCES OF SUPPLES AND SERVICES (ยง 19-4303)

level.text: The Library may satisfy requirements for supplies, services and construction from one of the following sources:
U.S. General Services Administration (GSA) Federal Supply Schedules;
Existing District of Columbia or Federal contracts;
D.C. Department of Corrections, Industries Division, or other District of Columbia agencies;
The CCO shall follow the procedures required by each source in satisfying Library procurement requirements.

The Library may satisfy requirements for supplies and services from other sources through full and open competition, including sources from the District of Columbia government’s local, small or disadvantaged business enterprise program in accordance with these regulations.
